Summary: Internal error when assigning integer array parameter
Description:
Hi,
when attempting to assign the values of an unpacked integer array parameter directly I get an internal error "InitArray type not assigned by AstPattern/Var visitor".
Code example:
module mymod
    #(
        parameter int unsigned VAL[2] = '{1, 2}
    )
    ();
endmodule

module top
    ();
    mymod #(
        .VAL ( '{1, 2} )
    ) myinst ();
endmodule

Verilator version and error message:
$ verilator --version
Verilator 4.218 2022-01-17 rev UNKNOWN.REV
$ verilator -Wall --cc array_params.sv --top-module top --lint-only
%Error: Internal Error: array_params.sv:11:16: ../V3Width.cpp:2239: InitArray type not assigned by AstPattern/Var visitor
                                                             : ... In instance top
   11 |         .VAL ( '{1, 2} )
      |                ^~

Declaring the array as a localparam first and passing that as the parameter works fine though.
